definition: to catch the breath audibly in a spasmodic contraction of the throat
to cry or weep with convulsive catching of the breath
to make a sound like that of a sob or sobbing
to bring to a specified state by sobbing
a sound like that of a sob

examples: … a guy who brought two dozen roses to a first coffee date and told you he felt like the luckiest SOB on the planet in the first five minutes.
